sen.e: On the other hand, it is also common that malts are traded among various corporations.

sen.j: つまりブレンデッドウイスキーには多くの蒸留所のモルトが用いられる。
sen.e: In short, for the production of blended whisky malts produced by many distilleries are used.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: In short, the production of blended whisky uses malts produced by many distilleries.
sen.cmt: シンプルな構文にするため、SVO構文にしました。
sen.e: In short, the production of blended whisky uses malts produced by many distilleries.

sen.j: だが、それぞれのモルトは異なる事業者が所有するということになる。
sen.e: But each malt is owned by different corporation.

sen.e: But each malt is owned by a different corporation.
sen.cmt: corporationは可算名詞のため不定冠詞を入れました。
sen.e: But each malt is owned by a different corporation.

sen.j: ところが日本ではこれとは異なるモデルが導入されている。
sen.e: In Japan, however, the different style has been introduced.
In Japan, however, a different style has been introduced.
sen.cmt: ・このモデルは初出のため不定冠詞が適切と思われます。
sen.e: In Japan, however, a different style has been introduced.

sen.j: 日本のウイスキー事業者は蒸留所とブレンデッドウイスキーの銘柄の両方を所有しているのである。
sen.e: The whisky producers in Japan have both distilleries and the brand of blended whisky.
The whisky producers in Japan possess both distilleries and brands of blended whisky.
sen.cmt: ・「所有」のニュアンスに近いpossessに変更しました。・銘柄は特定のものではないため、定冠詞は削除し、無冠詞複数形としました。
sen.e: The whisky producers in Japan possess both distilleries and brands of blended whisky.

sen.j: そのため競合する事業者とのあいだでは、モルトの売買がなされるということが少ない。
sen.e: Because of this it is rare for malts to be traded among the producers.
Because of this, it is rare for malts to be traded among the producers.
sen.cmt: ・余分なスペースを削除しました。・スタイル統一のためコンマを追加しました。
sen.e: Because of this, it is rare for malts to be traded among the producers.

sen.j: そのため日本のブレンデッド・ウイスキーは同じ会社の複数の蒸留所で生産されるモルトウイスキーだけで作られていることが多い。
sen.e: Therefore, Japanese blended whiskies are often made with only more than one malt whisky produced in distilleries of the same whisky producing company.

sen.e: Therefore, Japanese blended whiskies are often made with only malt whiskies produced in more than one distilleries of the same whisky producing company.

sen.e: Therefore, Japanese blended whiskies are often made with only malt whiskies produced in more than one distilleries of the same whisky producing company.

sen.j: 一部ではスコットランドの蒸留所で作られたモルトを輸入して配合するということもある。
sen.e: And in some producers the malts produced by distilleries in Scotland are imported and blended with Japanese malts.

sen.e: Some producers import and blend malts produced by distilleries in Scotland with Japanese malts.

sen.e: Some producers import and blend malts produced by distilleries in Scotland with Japanese malts.

sen.j: これはつまり、日本のブレンダーはそれぞれの製品を作るためのパレットをきわめて少なくしていたということである。
sen.e: This means that blenders in Japan have quite limited choices to produce their own product.
This means that blenders in Japan have quite limited choices to produce their own products.
sen.cmt: 製品は一つに限らないため複数としました。
sen.e: This means that blenders in Japan have quite limited choices to produce their own products.

sen.j: このような状況がジャパニーズのブレンデッドウイスキーが、とくに日本国外で成功を収めるうえで制限要素となってきたと考えられている。
sen.e: It was considered that such circumstances were the barriers for Japanese blended whiskies to succeed, especially in overseas market.
It was considered that such circumstances were the barriers for Japanese blended whiskies to succeed, especially in overseas market.

sen.j: このため日本のそれぞれの蒸留所は近年、次第に多様なものへとなっていった。
sen.e: Because of this each distillery in Japan has been recently diversified gradually.
Because of this, each distillery in Japan has been recently diversified gradually.

sen.e: Because of this, each distillery in Japan has been recently diversified gradually.

sen.j: つまり日本では1か所の蒸留所において、幅広いものを作っているのである。
sen.e: To be more specific in Japan whisky producers make wide variety of malts in one distillery.

sen.e: To be more specific, in Japan, whisky producers make a wide variety of malts in one distillery.

sen.j: アイラ島・モルトのようなスモーキーで泥炭の香りの強いものからストラスペイ (スコットランド)・モルトのような軽く繊細なものまでである。
sen.e: The malts are from the one like Islay malt that has smoky and strong flavor of peat to the one like Strathpay (Scotland) malt that has light and delicate flavor.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Such malts range from the one like Islay malt that has a smoky and strong flavor of peat to the one like Strathpay (Scotland) malt that has a light and delicate flavor.

sen.e: Such malts range from the one like Islay malt that has a smoky and strong flavor of peat to the one like Strathpay (Scotland) malt that has a light and delicate flavor.

sen.j: このような日本の蒸留所における多様化と工夫でジャパニーズ・ウイスキーは世界において高い評価を受けるようになっていった。
sen.e: With such diversification and ingenuity of distilleries in Japan, Japanese whiskies have come to be given high evaluation in the world.
With such diversification and ingenuity of distilleries in Japan, Japanese whiskies have come to be given high evaluation in the world.

sen.e: Also in Japan, whisky is drunk in unique ways.

sen.j: ウイスキーと一緒に食事をしたり、また湯割りや水割りにしたりしている。
sen.e: People drink whisky over eating meal or drink diluting it with hot or cold water.

sen.e: People drink whisky over meal or dilute it with hot or cold water.
